ygData.subject: Re: Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
ygData.msgSnippet: The cloak of the Icebear, the gigantic zigthing, and one other item that I forget, check EQ-liser that got the whats what on Karg.. Chris Benco Manager of
ygData.messageBody:
The cloak of the Icebear, the gigantic zigthing, and one other item that
I forget, check EQ-liser that got the whats what on Karg..

Chris Benco
Manager of Technical Support X Technology Inc.
Bash@... - (440)498-1222 x111

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [SMTP:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 10:47 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Other items?
>
> I know he carries a superior Polar Bear cloak... what else does he
> have?
>
> > ----------
> > From: CAB[SMTP:Bash@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 11:43 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
> >
> > From: CAB <Bash@...>
> >
> > If it's on a roaming barb in everfrost my guess would have to be
> Karg
> > Icebear. He's killable by a group of 40's I believe maybe alittle
> less.
> > He's got 2-3 other VERY nice items on him, so he may even be higher
> than
> > that. All I know is my highest level bard is 20th and he's still
> WAY
> > red..
> >
> > Chris Benco
> > Manager of Technical Support X Technology Inc.
> > Bash@... - (440)498-1222 x111
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Nick Morgowicz [SMTP:nomorgow@...]
> > > Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 7:44 AM
> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [warriors_eq] Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
> > >
> > > From: Nick Morgowicz <nomorgow@...>
> > >
> > > Heya, i just saw this latest addition to gameznet and it looked
> very
> > > interesting. With 18dmg, 39 delay, and glowing like a greater
> > > lighstone, this two handed sword is calling to be my replacement
> for
> > > the
> > > AGI stealing BBC. Thing is though, the website only said it would
> be
> > > found on a roaming barbarian in everfrost. Does anyone know which
> > > barbarian has it? My drow warrior is already KOS there, so it's
> no
> > > big
> > > deal if i kill a few barbarians :)
> > >
> > > To John - I didn't catch you on last eve. Hopefully tonight after
> > > work
> > > we can get together and share stories. I was in Guk and Cazic but
> > > I'll
> > > go anywhere really :)
> > >
> > > Nick
> > >
